comments.body: Again, all links pointing to `copy-docs` branch should be updated (with a link to `develop` branch) on a subsequent PR once this PR is merged

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@Also, you created a branch `grep-errors-script` that (fortunately!) nothing depended on, and a `hotfix/remove-trigger` branch, but on top of `master`, not `develop`.

If you'd like to quickly recreate this repository state on your local machine, you can use [this handy script (link)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VirtusLab/git-machete/copy-docs/docs/blog-1/sandbox-setup.sh),
which will set it up in `machete-sandbox` directory in your home folder.
